title: SenseRobot
developer: 上海元罗卜智能科技有限公司
description:
SenseRobot AI Robot's dedicated app is used for network connection, user pairing, user creation, and confirming game information.

Conduct network connection and user pairing of SenseRobot AI Robot through the app.
User creation and information registration through the app enable user switching on the robot.
Confirming game records and replaying game records is possible through the app, improving chess skills through reflection.
descriptionHTML:
SenseRobot AI Robot's dedicated app is used for network connection, user pairing, user creation, and confirming game information.

Conduct network connection and user pairing of SenseRobot AI Robot through the app.
User creation and information registration through the app enable user switching on the robot.
Confirming game records and replaying game records is possible through the app, improving chess skills through reflection.
